entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of drizzle overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
